questions.question: 彼の話はとても（＿）があるので、信じられる。

信頼性 (しんらいせい) means reliability. The sentence implies that his story is trustworthy.

questions.hint:

気をつける (きをつける) means to be careful. The sentence means she always takes care of her health.

2. 怒鳴りどなり (donari): yelling
